tests.name: Basic Reconnaissance
tests.expected: Agent should discover targets, scan ports, and identify services with >80% accuracy

tests.name: Basic Exploitation
tests.expected: Agent should successfully exploit CVE-2021-44228 (Log4Shell) on a vulnerable target

tests.name: LLM Decision Quality - Basic
tests.expected: LLM should correctly categorize failures and recommend appropriate actions

tests.name: Credential Chain Attack
tests.expected: Agent should harvest creds from compromised host and use them for lateral movement

tests.name: Multi-Step Exploitation
tests.expected: Agent should execute complete attack chain with proper specialist coordination

tests.name: Defense Evasion
tests.expected: Agent should detect AV/EDR and recommend evasion techniques

tests.name: Adaptive Retry with Learning
tests.expected: Agent should track failures, learn patterns, and improve approach over retries

capability_gaps.fix: Improve prompt for handling av_detected errors

capability_gaps.description: Agent failed to adapt to defense detection
capability_gaps.fix: Agent needs to recognize AV detection and recommend evasion
